data.actual_result: Overlay prompt appears, and allows you to show the overlay despite it being disabled for that game
data.expected_result: Overlay prompt should not appear, and allow you to open the overlay because it’s disabled for that game
data.short_description: Refreshing Discord while in a Rich Presence game with overlay disabled for that game shows the “Turn on Overlay” prompt if you don’t interact with the game
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into Game Activity in user settings and disable the overlay for a Rich Presence game “I used Fortnite” - Launch the Rich Presence game that you disabled the overlay on - After the game is started, tab back to Discord and refresh it using Ctrl + R - Right after you refresh, switch back to the game before Discord has loaded in - After switching back to the game, wait around 20-30 seconds, and watch for the overlay prompt to appear - When the overlay prompt appears, enter the keybind that appears on the prompt
